price: 85. When he said to his father and to his people: "What is it that which you worship?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوۡمِهِۦ مَاذَا تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: idh qāla li-abīhi waqawmihi mādhā taʿbudūna
